title: Fort Dupont Park: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           National Capitol Parks-East 1900 Anacostia Drive SE  Washington, DC 20020                 Directions         No physical address. Best address to use is as follows; 3600 F Street SE Washington D.C.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Fort DuPont Park dawn to dusk   Standard Hours    Sunday: Open 24 hours   Monday: Open 24 hours   Tuesday: Open 24 hours   Wednesday: Open 24 hours   Thursday: Open 24 hours   Friday: Open 24 hours   Saturday: Open 24 hours             Weather           Open in all weather, unless otherwise noted under the alerts section of the parks website.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Fort DuPont Park - $0.00 f=Fee Free   Entrance Passes:   Fort DuPont Park - $0.00 No passes required.         Visitor Centers              Â    Fort DuPont park is a 400 acre site and is one of Washington DC's largest parks. The site is an important sub-watershed of the Anacostia River. Fort DuPont is a very popular place for hiking, biking, picnics, gardening, music, and ranger led Civil War Programs.
